Java to Graphviz maven plugin
Last Published: 2022-05-02  | Version: 1.0.4
Java to Graphviz maven plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

java-to-graphviz:java-to-graphviz

Full name:

com.randomnoun.maven.plugins:java-to-graphviz-maven-plugin:1.0.4:java-to-graphviz

Description:

Maven goal which generates graphviz dot and png

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: pre-site.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
<graphvizExecutable> File - Path to 'dot' executable
Default value is: dot.exe.
<invokeGraphviz> boolean - Invoke graphviz
Default value is: true.
User property is: invokeGraphviz.
<outputDirectory> File - Directory containing the generated DOT and PNG files.

If images are being added to generated java documentation, this files in this directory should be copied into the javadocDirectory of the maven-javadoc-plugin.


Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/java-to-graphviz.
<verbose> boolean - True to increase logging
Default value is: false.
User property is: verbose.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
<fileset> FileSet - The input files to process.
User property is: fileset.
<options> Map - Option keys and defaults:
edgerNames=control-flow
csv list of edger names. Possible edger names: control-flow, ast
enableKeepNodeFilter=false
if true, will perform node filtering
defaultKeepNode=true
if true, filter will keep nodes by default
keepNode=
space-separated nodeTypes for fine-grained keepNode control. Prefix nodeType with '-' to exclude, '+' or no prefix to include
e.g. "-expressionStatement -block -switchCase"
to exclude those nodeTypes when defaultKeepNode=true

NB: any node with a 'gv' comment will always be kept


User property is: options.
<outputFilenamePattern> String - Pattern to generate the output filename from the input filename.

Pattern can include:

  • {directory} - the relative directory of the source java file (relative to the fileset base directory)
  • {basename} - the base name of the source java file ( without directory, or extension )
  • {index} - a zero-based diagram index; will only increase if the source file creates multiple diagrams.

Default value is: {dir}/doc-files/{basename}.png.
<userCssRules> List - Additional CSS rules
User property is: userCssRules.
<userCssUrls> List - URLs to add to the list of user css imports
User property is: userCssUrls.

Parameter Details

<fileset>

The input files to process.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.shared.model.fileset.FileSet
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fileset

<graphvizExecutable>

Path to 'dot' executable
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: dot.exe

<invokeGraphviz>

Invoke graphviz
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: invokeGraphviz
  • Default: true

<options>

Option keys and defaults:
edgerNames=control-flow
csv list of edger names. Possible edger names: control-flow, ast
enableKeepNodeFilter=false
if true, will perform node filtering
defaultKeepNode=true
if true, filter will keep nodes by default
keepNode=
space-separated nodeTypes for fine-grained keepNode control. Prefix nodeType with '-' to exclude, '+' or no prefix to include
e.g. "-expressionStatement -block -switchCase"
to exclude those nodeTypes when defaultKeepNode=true

NB: any node with a 'gv' comment will always be kept

  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Required: No
  • User Property: options

<outputDirectory>

Directory containing the generated DOT and PNG files.

If images are being added to generated java documentation, this files in this directory should be copied into the javadocDirectory of the maven-javadoc-plugin.

  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/java-to-graphviz

<outputFilenamePattern>

Pattern to generate the output filename from the input filename.

Pattern can include:

  • {directory} - the relative directory of the source java file (relative to the fileset base directory)
  • {basename} - the base name of the source java file ( without directory, or extension )
  • {index} - a zero-based diagram index; will only increase if the source file creates multiple diagrams.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: {dir}/doc-files/{basename}.png

<userCssRules>

Additional CSS rules
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No
  • User Property: userCssRules

<userCssUrls>

URLs to add to the list of user css imports
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No
  • User Property: userCssUrls

<verbose>

True to increase logging
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: verbose
  • Default: false
